Germany: Battle of Soissons (718): Charles defeated the armies of Chilperic II and Aquitaine at Soissons. Chilperic II fled to Aquitaine.
Charles recognized Chilperic II as king of the Franks in exchange for his appointment as mayor of the palace with extensive powers.
Indinesia: Sri Indravarman King of Srivijaya send a letter to the Caliph Umar bin Abdul Aziz of the Umayyad Caliphate in Damascus, signing early ancient Indonesian official contact with Islamic world in the Middle East.
Japan: Fujiwara no Fuhito compiles the Yōrō Code (the update of Taihō Code) which is accepted in 757
Spain: The Visigothic nobleman Pelagius of Asturias rebelled against the Umayyad Caliphate.
